description: The cause of the issue identified in CVE-2023-5487 stems from an inappropriate implementation within the fullscreen feature of the Chromium open-source software, which is utilized by Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based). This flaw affects version 118.0.2088.46 and has been rectified in the latest release. Users on earlier builds may experience unintended behaviors or security risks due to this implementation error. The vulnerability has been addressed in the Chromium updates, ensuring that Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) is no longer susceptible to the described issues, as documented in KB-118.0.2088.46.
